name: TIR - Truck strategy Game for MS-DOS
name_original: TIR - Truck strategy Game for MS-DOS
description:
Truck economic strategy game in Hungary after "wind of change" in early '90s. Save a shipping company on the brink of bankruptcy. Upgrade your vehicle fleet, buy locations, tie up stores, tap into extra deals, automate tedious and tedious tasks.

In fact the game has been never finished, became too complicated and the development tool outdated, but surely playable for few hours. ;)

Developed at the end of '90s, with Turbo Pascal for MS-Dos. If you remember what is it. :)
Retro PC fans might be interested in it.

PS.: As a bonus, there is a Tetris game what I made around that time. Also for DOS. 75kbyte,  good old days... :)
